DOCSPACE_BASE_URL.description: The base URL of the DocSpace instance for API requests.

DOCSPACE_API_KEY.description: The API key for accessing the API.

DOCSPACE_TRANSPORT.description: The transport protocol to use for communication with the MCP server.

DOCSPACE_DYNAMIC.description: The flag that indicates whether the MCP server should use meta tools.

DOCSPACE_TOOLSETS.description: The list of toolsets to enable for the MCP server.

DOCSPACE_ENABLED_TOOLS.description: The list of tools to enable for the MCP server.

DOCSPACE_DISABLED_TOOLS.description: The list of tools to disable for the MCP server.

DOCSPACE_USER_AGENT.description: The user agent to include in the User-Agent header for API requests.

DOCSPACE_AUTHORIZATION.description: The raw value to include in the Authorization header for API requests.

DOCSPACE_AUTH_TOKEN.description: The Personal Access Token (PAT) for accessing the API.

DOCSPACE_USERNAME.description: The username for accessing the API using basic authentication.

DOCSPACE_PASSWORD.description: The password for accessing the API using basic authentication.

DOCSPACE_SESSION_TTL.description: The time-to-live (TTL) for HTTP sessions in milliseconds.

DOCSPACE_SESSION_INTERVAL.description: The interval for checking HTTP sessions for expiration in milliseconds.

DOCSPACE_OAUTH_BASE_URL.description: The base URL of the DocSpace OAuth service for OAuth requests.

DOCSPACE_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: The client ID of the OAuth application.

DOCSPACE_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The client secret of the OAuth application.

DOCSPACE_OAUTH_AUTH_TOKEN_ALGORITHM.description: The algorithm to use for signing OAuth access tokens.

DOCSPACE_OAUTH_AUTH_TOKEN_TTL.description: The time-to-live (TTL) for OAuth access tokens in milliseconds.

DOCSPACE_OAUTH_AUTH_TOKEN_SECRET_KEY.description: The secret key to use for signing OAuth access tokens.

DOCSPACE_OAUTH_STATE_TOKEN_ALGORITHM.description: The algorithm to use for signing OAuth state tokens.

DOCSPACE_OAUTH_STATE_TOKEN_TTL.description: The time-to-live (TTL) for OAuth state tokens in milliseconds.

DOCSPACE_OAUTH_STATE_TOKEN_SECRET_KEY.description: The secret key to use for signing OAuth state tokens.

DOCSPACE_SERVER_BASE_URL.description: The base URL of the server.

DOCSPACE_HOST.description: The host to bind the server to.

DOCSPACE_PORT.description: The port to bind the server to.

DOCSPACE_SERVER_PROXY_HOPS.description: The number of proxy servers between the server and the client.

DOCSPACE_SERVER_CORS_MCP_ORIGIN.description: The list of allowed origins to include in the Access-Control-Allow-Origin header for CORS requests to MCP endpoints.

DOCSPACE_SERVER_CORS_MCP_MAX_AGE.description: The maximum age in milliseconds to include in the Access-Control-Max-Age header for CORS requests to MCP endpoints.

DOCSPACE_SERVER_CORS_OAUTH_ORIGIN.description: The list of allowed origins to include in the Access-Control-Allow-Origin header for CORS requests to OAuth endpoints.

DOCSPACE_SERVER_CORS_OAUTH_MAX_AGE.description: The maximum age in milliseconds to include in the Access-Control-Max-Age header for CORS requests to OAuth endpoints.

DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_MCP_CAPACITY.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the MCP endpoints.

DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_MCP_WINDOW.description: The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the MCP endpoints.

DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_SERVER.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the OAuth server metadata endpoint.
The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the OAuth server metadata endpoint.

DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_RESOUR.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the OAuth resource metadata endpoint.
The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the OAuth resource metadata endpoint.

DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_AUTHOR.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the OAuth authorization endpoint.
The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the OAuth authorization endpoint.

DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_CALLBA.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the OAuth callback endpoint.
The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the OAuth callback endpoint.

DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_INTROS.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the OAuth introspection endpoint.
The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the OAuth introspection endpoint.

DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_REGIST.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the OAuth client registration endpoint.
The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the OAuth client registration endpoint.

DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_REVOKE.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the OAuth token revocation endpoint.
The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the OAuth token revocation endpoint.

DOCSPACE_SERVER_RATE_LIMITS_OAUTH_TOKEN_.description: The maximum number of requests allowed per window for the OAuth token endpoint.
The time window in milliseconds for the rate limit for the OAuth token endpoint.

DOCSPACE_REQUEST_QUERY.description: The flag that indicates whether the server should accept configuration via query parameters in incoming requests.

DOCSPACE_REQUEST_AUTHORIZATION_HEADER.description: The flag that indicates whether the server should check for the Authorization header in incoming requests.

DOCSPACE_REQUEST_HEADER_PREFIX.description: The prefix to use with custom configuration headers.
